entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert failure in GC/API/NoGCRegion/Callback_Svr test #86612
  • `GenTreeAddrMode` has implicit truncation for its `gtOffset` field #86609
    Future
  • ComInterfaceGenerator does not support by-value In and Out attributes for unmanaged-to-managed stubs #86608
  • aspnetcore 8 preview 4 blazor wasm size regression #86601
  • publish a Microsoft.NET.WebAssembly.Webcil nuget to the transport feed #86597
    8.0.0
  • Document the `Thread_AssignCpuGroups` config var #86596
    8.0.0
  • [Tracking] Figure out how we should handle the disposing of the meters created from meter factory #86592
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `ValueTextEquals` supporting `JsonEncodedText` as a parameter #86591
  • [API Proposal]: Make `IPAddress`es comparable #86589
  • Incorrect RequiresDynamicCode attribute on System.Type.GetEnumValues #86585
    8.0.0
  • Trimmer implementation of type hierarchy marking shows order dependent behavior #86580
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.ToBoolean supports "1" and "0" values #86579
  • Create custom InlineArray marshaller for `LibraryImport` generator #86572
    8.0.0
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23269.37] global tool "dotnet-snow" cannot load libSkiaSharp.dll #86571
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\Activator\\Activator\\Activator #86569
    8.0.0
  • [AOT] ExpressionTree AOT very slow #86568
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadWrite_Random_Success #86565
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests_netstandard17.DroppedWatcher_Collectible #86564
    Future
  • Test failure XmlSerializerTests.Xml_NookTypes #86563
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\NDPin\\ndpinfinal\\ndpinfinal.cmd #86562

Closed

  • [WinHttpHandler] Long running test: ResponseHeadersRead_SynchronizationContextNotUsedByHandler on Win7/Win8 #54034
    Future
  • JIT: Failures in crossgen2 related tests with physical promotion enabled #86588
    8.0.0
  • Can't build runtime on Ubuntu 20.04 (LTS) due to native PGO format #86531
  • Enable EventPipe test for NativeAOT #84701
    8.0.0
  • Local linux builds should not enable PGO by default #85785
  • Size saving opportunity for System.Text.Json generators with custom converters #84015
    8.0.0
  • AOT 32-bits #86558
  • [API Proposal]: Move IPNetwork to System.Net and add a string constructor #86584
  • Mono incorrectly throws a TypeLoadException for a recursive type definition #85821
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeMap[type] != TYP_UNDEF' in 'Test.Program:testEquals(System.Numerics.Vector3):int' during 'Morph - Structs/AddrExp' #85608
    8.0.0
  • Set Browsable property value at runtime by reflection #86544
  • Test failure System.Net.Mail.Tests.LoggingTest.EventSource_EventsRaisedAsExpected #85754
  • System.Text.Json Desrialization to an IParsable<T> #86529
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite #85233
    Future
  • Console UTF-8 input is misbehaving on Windows #43295
    Future
  • [mono] Change bound delegates dependency of bound_method + delegate_type to use just delegate_type #83329
    8.0.0
  • Code coverage failing for corelib #81835
    8.0.0
  • when native AOT support to compile to 32 bit application #86570
  • Android x86/x64 CI machine issue: Failure calling service package: Broken pipe #86383
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] No longer discard jiterp inference information when crossing a branch #86611
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Add get AppContext properties diagnostic IPC command #86610
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Cache some allocations when invoking Linq.Expression lambdas. #86607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add `DiagnosticOr<T>` type for gracefully handling failures in incremental generator transformations #86603
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix Incorrect RequiresDynamicCode attribute message #86602
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Abstract out System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator #86594
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix possible stack overflow in TotalOrderIeee754Comparer #86593
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][aot] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on iOS #86583
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [DRAFT][mono][AOT] Enabled tests which fail to JIT compile during AOT #86581
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [6.0-staging] Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest in mobile #86576
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 #86574
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Metrics APIs Additions #86567
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Add a test for the first chance exception event to NativeAOT smoke tests #86560
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rename setting for using RID graph to System.Runtime.Loader.UseRidGraph #86598
    area-Host
  • Ensure Avx512Vbmi has [Intrinsic] on the right members #86604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • JIT: Switch basic block successors to a visitor pattern #86543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch physical promotion stress modes to only be enabled in checked builds #86590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid capturing diagnostic objects in Regex source generator incremental values #86606
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Avoid capturing diagnostic objects in SG incremental values #86605
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [6.0] Missing version number bump #86600
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Baseline a couple more JIT tests #86429
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that the shuffle zero mask copies all bits #86453
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Avoid ToString allocations for each ISpanFormattable value in string.Concat/Join(..., IEnumerable<T>) #86521
    area-System.Runtime
  • Vectorize IEnumerable<T>.Sum where possible #84519
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Apply the SourceWriter pattern to the STJ source generator. #86526
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Rename a couple model specs for config binding generator #86459
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some bugs in the test sets 'System.Runtime.Tests' and 'System.Linq.Expressions.Tests' for loongarch64. #86435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Update createdumpwindows to not appear to succeed after getting ERROR_PARTIAL_COPY 5 times #85462
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize shorter buffers for CRC-32 on Intel #86539
    tenet-performance, community-contribution, area-System.IO.Hashing, 8.0.0
  • [mono] When creating an array type, don't do full initialization of the element type #85828
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Disable JitOptimizationSensitive check on NativeAOT testing #86523
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Lots of tweaks to FrozenDictionary/Set analysis and hashing #86293
    area-System.Collections
  • This fixes an issue with gradual decommit in scenarios where we have … #84975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use new queue for iOS arm64 device tests #86575
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix code coverage of corelib by updating coverlet #86566
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Refactor name convention #86446
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Increase timeouts on perf-slow pipeline (because of current load on queues). #86547
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add DebuggerDisplay for SearchValues #86559
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • [7.0] Remove centos 8 images #86477
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [6.0] Remove centos 8 images #86478
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Guarded devirtualization: devirtualize dual-morphic interface calls on NativeAOT #86551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Avoid calling Encoding.GetBytes when Vector128 is not hardware accelerated #85267
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2186124 #86535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unreachable filter end #86492
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Update GetElement and ToScalar to lower IND, LCL_FLD, and LCL_VAR specially #86400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use cinv and cneg instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix endless loop in illink analyzer #86449
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn if StringMarshalling doesn't match base and warn if base interface cannot be generated #86467
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Only call Free in unmanaged->managed stubs when ownership has been transfered to the callee #86415
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to enable EventPipe in Linux #86226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector64<T>/Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix crossgen2.pdb #86512
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [WIP] Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Turn webcil off for .NET < 8.0 #86505
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Dogfood ComInterfaceGenerator in crossgen2 #84643
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, area-Debugger-mono, area-Threading-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Enable the "TC_QuickJitForLoops" on LoongArch64. #86022
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve BigInteger operators +, - and * for trivial cases #84733
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Dynamic heap count #86245
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow overbudget for small methods #86473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][browser] threads experiment #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    blocked, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Update ILCompiler paths to handle PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #85996
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Read public GC options if available #86068
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
